description:
Different surveys have told us that as many as 70% of you are unhappy with your job or career and are disengaged at one level or another.

This statistic is appalling! Each and everyone of you were designed with a special gift or talent. You were created to be a genius. Unfortunately the vast majority never discover what or where this gift lies much less how to utilize it for their benefit and for those they care about.

Discover and Apply Lasting Principles and Uncover Your Passion and Purpose in Life With This Series of Video Lectures.

  • Recognize the power of a Positive Self Esteem
  • Learn a method of overcoming limiting beliefs
  • Understand failure is just another tool in the improvement process
  • Recognize the key characteristics in becoming a top producer
  • Identify the power our relationships have in our life
  • Create there own personal Luck Formula
  • Develop a Mindset of Success

Discovering and learning to apply these proven principles in your life will enable you to make better choices in your career, relationships and other areas of your life. Developing the correct mindset will support your desire to pursue what you are passionate about. Being intentional and having the right mindset create the consistency needed to prevail.

But achieving your objective, will not be an easy thing. You will need to be committed to the process and recognize the result isn't going to happen overnight. The rewards will be many for your perseverance. You will never feel more alive than when you are doing what you are passionate about.

“As you begin changing your thinking, start immediately to change your behavior. Begin to act the part of the person you would like to become. Take action on your behavior. Too many people want to feel, then take action. This never works.” - John Maxwell

Contents and Review

This Course contains 20 lectures and over 100 minutes of video content and a number of exercises that will take several hours to complete. The downloadable workbook is 34 pages of notes on the lectures plus homework assignments on each section. It is designed for anyone regardless of experience level who wishes to fulfill their passion and purpose by understanding and making the better choices. Transforming Choices.

Students will learn what it takes to be a top producer in life and how to make the correct changes for yourself so you too will be one.

Since relationships are a key component to being successful, you will learn how to better evaluate your current relationships and how to build them stronger and enable them to support your success journey.

To begin the journey you will learn how to establish a mindset of awareness. Where you are now and where you want to go. Then lay out the plan to get there.

You will apply the principles of being intentional about your actions and understand the impact this will have on your life.

Since we are human beings it is also important to discover what being us means. The doing will flow from your passion and be sustained when you look after yourself.

By the end of the course you will have the awareness to begin the creation of a life plan which will guide you from where you are, to where you want to go.

Please notice the bonus material provided. It is intended to add value to your studies.
title: Your Success Journey and 5 Critical Areas That have impact
